Uses of Interface
es.csic.iiia.bms.MaxOperator

  • Packages that use MaxOperator 
    Package Description
    es.csic.iiia.bms
    Implementation of the binarized max-sum algorithm as interactions between factors.
    es.csic.iiia.bms.factors
    Efficient implementations of some particular higher-order factors.
    es.csic.iiia.bms.util
    Utility classes that don't fit anywhere else.

      Max-sum max operator that uses the max function.

      Max-sum max operator that uses the min function.
